title: Stand alone web form that will run on a LAMP server.
snippet:
11 multi choice question
Each question has 5 options – each gains a different score
Create a score from 11 questions
The score will then be placed into one of 7 bands
The user will be shown their band as a red arrow pointing to their band and showing the other 6 bands
The user will be shown a description of their band (but not the other 6) and a pie chart (there are 7 pie charts but they will only be shown one)
At the beginning collect name and email
At the end send the name, band and email address to a fixed email address.
Offer the client to email and or print their results (including band description and pie chart)
The form will work on an iPad
